content.title: Mental phenomena are preceded by mind, have mind as their leader, are made by mind.
content.author: Dhammapada, Verse 1 (trans. K.R. Norman, 1997)
content.quote_text: Mental phenomena are preceded by mind, have mind as their leader, are made by mind.

generation.prompt: Christopher Nolan style cinematic realism with practical effects aesthetic, dramatic architectural perspectives emphasizing scale and geometry, high-contrast naturalistic lighting with deep shadows, wide-angle establishing shots showing spatial relationships, visual metaphors for time and space through environmental design, IMAX-quality photographic clarity. Capturing the vibe of mindfulness, attention, intention, awareness. square composition, centered focus, 1:1 aspect ratio
